abstract: Saxophonist Zem Audu and soprano Monika Jalili will share their forays into Nigerian and Iranian music as part of Crossing Borders: Memory and Heritage in a New America at ArtsWestchester's performance space in White Plains (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: On March 20 and 21, two musicians will offer the fruits of their explorations as part of “Crossing Borders: Memory and Heritage in a New America,” a series at ArtsWestchester’s performance space in White Plains.

headline.main: Around the World in a Song
headline.seo: Bringing Explorations of Global Sounds to Westchester as Part of the ‘Crossing Borders’ Series
headline.print_headline: Around the World in a Song
